archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Requirement management
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation:
Requirment impact assessment.
In TOGAF it is a central process The phase is a strange one compared to the other since not all of the steps that are inside are eceuted inside R
Hvilket nivå? Hvor langt ned? Egentilig en administrativ fase som sikrer at ting blir logget og belsuttet basert på behov. Kun administrere og forvalte kravene.
Objectives: * Ensure that the Requiremnts Managment process is sustained and operates for all releveant ADM pahases * Manage archtecture requriements indentified during any execution of the ADM ccle or a phase * Ensure that the relevant archtecture requriemetns are avialabel or use by each phase as the pahse is executed
Approach * The ability to deal with changes in the reuqirments is curcial to the ADM process since architecture deals with cucertainty and change * Architeccture bridges the divide betwen the aspirations of the stakeholders and a practival solution * The Requirement Management proces does not dispose of, address or prioritize the reqirements. * ...
